trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 控件的控件数组。

trans-unit.source: The `PictureBoxArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `PictureBox` array.
trans-unit.target: `PictureBoxArray`类提供了等效的运行时功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`PictureBox`数组。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供的 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空间中的函数和对象是提供给用于将 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的工具使用的。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray>，你还必须调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.SetIndex%2A>方法创建的初始元素数组中。

trans-unit.target: 将在其中承载控件数组的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> class, specifying its container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> 类的新实例，并指定其容器。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether a control is a member of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定控件是否是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> 的一个成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="target" /> is a member of the control array; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="target" /> 是控件数组的一个成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned.
trans-unit.target: `CanExtend`方法可以用于确定是否可以使用特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>控件是控件数组从其克隆其他元素的基本元素。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: `Click`事件传递<xref:System.EventArgs>到其事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.MouseClick>如果单击引起操作不是鼠标，如按 ENTER 键操作，将不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置它认为是双击而不是两次单击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: `Click`双击控件每次引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有事件处理程序`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>的事件[控件](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)、`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>时控件是双击和调用这两种方法将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: 如果双击控件时，控件不支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，`Click`可能引发事件两次。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A>通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 在将对象拖入控件的边界时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `DragEnter` event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: `DragEnter`用户拖放操作过程中首次将鼠标光标拖到控件时将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged out of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 将对象拖出控件的边界时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `DragLeave` event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: `DragLeave`用户拖出控件的光标或用户取消当前的拖放操作时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 在将对象拖到控件的边界上发生。

trans-unit.source: The `DragOver` event is raised when the mouse cursor moves within the bounds of the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: `DragOver`鼠标光标拖放操作期间的控件的边界内移动时将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this <see langword="Protected" /> method is usually not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 因为该类通常不用于创建类的实例，所以，通常不直接调用此 <see langword="Protected" /> 方法，而是通过派生类调用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在执行拖动操作期间发生。

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: `GiveFeedback`启动拖放操作时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用`GiveFeedback`事件，拖动事件的源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为提供的用户的可视反馈。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在控件应重新定位其子控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: `Layout`事件发生时添加或删除时的边界的控件更改，以及在出现的其他更改可能会影响控件的布局子控件。

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 布局事件，可以通过使用抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: 挂起的布局，可在控件上执行多个操作，而无需执行一次布局针对每项更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你调整大小，并将控件移动，每个操作都会引发`Layout`事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the asynchronous image-load operation is completed, been canceled, or raised an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在异步图像加载操作完成、取消或引发异常时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `LoadCompleted` event occurs only when the image is loaded asynchronously by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadAsync%2A> methods, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.WaitOnLoad%2A> is false.
trans-unit.target: `LoadCompleted`事件发生仅映像异步加载时通过使用之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadAsync%2A>方法，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.WaitOnLoad%2A>为 false。

trans-unit.source: If the image-load is canceled by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.CancelAsync%2A> method the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> will be set to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像加载取消通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.CancelAsync%2A>方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>将设置为 true。

trans-unit.source: If an exception or error occurs during the load process, it will be caught and the `Error` property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> will contain the exception information.
trans-unit.target: 如果在加载过程中发生异常或错误，将捕获和`Error`属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>将包含异常信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the progress of an asynchronous image-loading operation has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在异步图像加载操作的进度更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `LoadProgressChanged` event occurs only when the image is loaded asynchronously by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: `LoadProgressChanged`事件发生仅映像异步加载时通过使用之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The progress percentage of the image load is reported with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 图像加载的进度百分比报告与<xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Handle the `LoadProgressChanged` event if you want to reflect the progress of an asynchronous image-loading operation in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> or similar control.
trans-unit.target: 处理`LoadProgressChanged`事件，如果你想要反映在异步图像加载操作的进度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>或相似的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs> to update the progress value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs>若要更新进度值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空间中的函数和对象是提供给用于将 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的工具使用的。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用鼠标单击控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control:
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针位于形状通常单击鼠标按钮会导致以下一系列的控件中的事件：

trans-unit.source: Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: 两次单击关闭发生的时间非常具体由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定将生成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>而不是第二个事件`MouseClick`事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> 事件是逻辑上控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 它们通常由其他操作，如按 ENTER 键在控件有焦点时引发。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针停放在控件上时发生。

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: 一个典型用途`MouseHover`是当鼠标悬停在控件 （"悬停矩形"） 周围的指定区域中控件上时显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件所需的暂停指定以毫秒为单位通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `MouseHover`定义和检测到门户中的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 在重绘控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `Paint` event handler is typically used to perform custom drawing when a control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: `Paint`事件处理程序通常用于在重绘控件时执行自定义绘制。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当控件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> is providing Help to accessibility applications.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> 为辅助功能应用程序提供帮助时发生。

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to enable users to invoke Help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>类以使用户能够调用可访问对象的帮助，通过按 F1 键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> gives you complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>在为您提供的完整信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 在拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: `QueryContinueDrag`拖放操作期间键盘或鼠标按钮状态更改时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: `QueryContinueDrag`事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ResetIndex" /> method is not supported in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> 类不支持 <see langword="ResetIndex" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported, and calling it does not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此方法，并调用它不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 在调整控件大小时发生。

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 若要确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的调整大小的控件，可以强制转换`sender`参数<xref:System.EventArgs>数据到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>并获取其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>属性 (或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>属性单独)。

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理自定义布局，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.Layout>事件而不是`Resize`事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.Layout>在响应中引发事件`Resize`事件，但还会在响应其他影响控件的布局更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Short" /> that represents the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Short" />，表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 中的初始 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The `SetIndex` method should only be called when you are creating the initial element in the control array.
trans-unit.target: `SetIndex`控件数组中创建的初始元素时，仅应调用方法。

trans-unit.source: To add subsequent elements, call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method and specify the `Index`.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加后续元素，调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A>方法并指定`Index`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> is a member of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 是否为此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray" /> 的成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a member of this control array; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是此控件数组的一个成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> is a member of a different <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray>, `ShouldSerializeIndex` returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> 是另一个 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray> 的成员，`ShouldSerializeIndex` 则返回 `false`。

trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空间中的函数和对象是提供给用于将 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的工具使用的。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control style changes.
trans-unit.target: 在控件样式更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `StyleChanged` event occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> flags have been added or changed.
trans-unit.target: `StyleChanged`事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>标志已添加或更改。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控件样式更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互，引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the system colors change.
trans-unit.target: 系统颜色更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors> is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 在控件完成验证时发生。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，或通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`false`、<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.Validating>和`Validated`事件将被抑制。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>设置为`true`中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.Validating>事件委托中，通常会发生后的所有事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.PictureBoxArray.Validating>事件将被抑制。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。
